about.title: About This Tool
about.description: The Game Report Generator helps you create reports for your gaming sessions. Whether you want to request permission from your girlfriend or parents to play games, or share your gaming joy and achievements with them, this tool makes it easy to document game details and statistics, and organize them into your game report.

steps.1: Navigate to the "Generate Report" section using the navigation bar above
steps.2: Enter the game title for the session you want to document
steps.3: Select the date when the game took place
steps.4: Input detailed player statistics in the provided text area
steps.5: Click "Generate Report" to create your formatted report

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.description: Game Report Generator is designed to bridge the communication gap between gamers and their loved ones. We understand the challenge of explaining your gaming passion to others, so we've created a tool that helps you generate comprehensive, easy-to-understand game reports.

features.title: Key Features
features.item1: Customizable report templates for different audiences
features.item3: Multi-language support (English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese)
features.item4: Detailed game statistics and achievements tracking
features.item5: User-friendly interface for quick report generation
